price: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds, He will give them their rewards in full, and Allah does not like the wrongdoers.”
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayuwaffīhim ujūrahum wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
translations: then He will grant them in full
